00008 #include "vectoreditor.h"
00009 
00010 #include <models/vector.h>
00011 
00012 #include <QLabel>
00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QGridLayout>
00015 
00016 VectorEditor::VectorEditor(const QString& title,
00017                                                    QWidget *parent): 
00018 QGroupBox(title, parent), 
00019 vector_(),
00020 enableBox_(tr("enable"), this),
00021 left_(this), right_(this) {
00022 
00023         left_.setMinimum(0);
00024         left_.setDisabled(true);
00025         right_.setMinimum(0);
00026         right_.setDisabled(true);
00027 
00028         QLabel* leftLabel = new QLabel(tr("Left Bound"), this);
00029         QLabel* rightLabel = new QLabel(tr("Right bound"), this);
00030 
00031         QGridLayout* boundLayout = new QGridLayout();
00032         boundLayout->addWidget(leftLabel, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00033         boundLayout->addWidget(&left_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00034         boundLayout->addWidget(rightLabel, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00035         boundLayout->addWidget(&right_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00036 
00037         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00038         topLayout->addWidget(&enableBox_);
00039         topLayout->addLayout(boundLayout);
00040 
00041         // when user changes the state of enable-check box 
00042         connect(&enableBox_, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)),
00043                 this, SLOT(onToggled(bool)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00044 
00045         connect(&left_, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
00046                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047         connect(&right_, SIGNAL(valueChanged(int)),
00048                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00049 }
00050 
00051 VectorEditor::~VectorEditor() {
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool VectorEditor::isValid() const {
00055         if (left_.value() < 0 || right_.value() < 0)
00056                 return false;
00057 
00058         return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 void VectorEditor::restoreChanges() {
00062 
00063         // if vector is defined
00064         if (vector_) {
00065 
00066                 enableBox_.setChecked(true);
00067                 left_.setValue(vector_->getLeft());
00068                 right_.setValue(vector_->getRight());
00069         }
00070         // if vector is undefined
00071         else {
00072                 enableBox_.setChecked(false);
00073                 left_.setValue(0);
00074                 right_.setValue(0);
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00078 QSharedPointer<Vector> VectorEditor::applyChanges() {
00079 
00080         // if vector is to be defined
00081         if (enableBox_.isChecked()) {
00082 
00083                 // if vector is not yet defined
00084                 if (!vector_) {
00085                         vector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>(new Vector());
00086                 }
00087 
00088                 // set the left and right bounds for vector
00089                 vector_->setLeft(left_.value());
00090                 vector_->setRight(right_.value());
00091         }
00092 
00093         // if vector should not exist
00094         else 
00095                 vector_.clear();
00096 
00097         return vector_;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void VectorEditor::onToggled( bool enabled ) {
00101         left_.setEnabled(enabled);
00102         right_.setEnabled(enabled);
00103         emit contentChanged();
00104 }
00105 
00106 void VectorEditor::setLeftMax( int max ) {
00107         left_.setMaximum(max);
00108         right_.setMaximum(max);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void VectorEditor::setRightMax( int max ) {
00112         right_.setMaximum(max);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void VectorEditor::setVector( QSharedPointer<Vector> vector ) {
00116         vector_ = vector;
00117 
00118         restoreChanges();
00119 }
00120 
00121 void VectorEditor::clear() {
00122 
00123         // disable the spin box editors
00124         onToggled(false);
00125         left_.setValue(0);
00126         right_.setValue(0);
00127 
00128         // clear the vector pointer
00129         vector_.clear();
00130 }
00131 
00132 int VectorEditor::getWidth() const {
00133 
00134         // if no vector is specified the width is one bit
00135         if (!enableBox_.isEnabled())
00136                 return 1;
00137 
00138         return left_.value() - right_.value();
00139 }
